case.name: Mehdi v Minister for Immigration and Multicultural and Indigenous Affairs [2006] FCA 498 (5 May 2006)

citphrases.citphrase: appeal from judgment of the federal magistrates court -change of circumstance (residence) (class ag) visa
whether applicant complied substantially with visa conditions prohibiting performance of "work" in australia
whether voluntary activity as a graphic artist was "an activity that, in australia, normally attracts remuneration"
factors relevant to determining whether the applicant "complied substantially" with the condition. administrative law

citances.sentence:
(Emphasis added) Like Gunawardena , Her Honour's judgment in Mehdi was upheld on appeal by a single judge of the Federal Court ( Mehdi v Minister for Immigration and Multicultural and Indigenous Affairs [2006] FCA 498 , Young J). The legislation, policy and other materials that are immediately relevant to this review are: Legislation:
Item 1222 of Schedule 1 to the Regulations
Part 572 of Schedule 2 to the Regulations
Migration Legislation Amendment (Overseas Students) Act 2000
Condition 8202 of Schedule 8 to the Regulations
Departmental policy:
Procedures Advice Manual 3: Generic Guidelines G - Student visas
Cases:
Kim v Witton [1995] FCA 1508 ; (1995) 59 FCR 258
Baidakova v Minister for Immigration and Multicultural Affairs [1998] FCA 1436
Pradhan v Minister for Immigration and Multicultural Affairs [1999] FCA 1240 ; (1999) 94 FCR 91
Kwan v Minister for Immigration and Multicultural Affairs [2002] FCA 498
Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affairs v Kwan [2002] FCAFC 380
Gurung v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affairs [2002] FCA 772
Siddique v Minister for Immigration and Multicultural and Indigenous Affairs [2003] FCAFC 16
Weerasinghe v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affairs [2004] FCA 261
Tian v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affairs [2004] FCA 216
Weerasinghe v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affairs [2004] FCA 261
Tian v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affair s [2004] FCAFC 238
Gunawardena v Minister for Immigration and Multicultural and Indigenous Affairs [2005] FCA 31
Mehdi v Minister for Immigration and Multicultural and Indigenous Affairs [2005] FMCA 1160
Mehdi v Minister for Immigration and Multicultural and Indigenous Affairs [2006] FCA 498 The Tribunal generally has regard to the Regulations as they stood at the time of a visa application.
